question: What river partially forms the old Czech-Moravian land border in Jihlava, Czech Republic?
asked_question_translated: Hvilken elv danner delvis den gamle tsjekkisk-moraviske landegrensen i Jihlava i Tsjekkia?
answer: Elven Jihlava danner delvis den gamle tsjekkisk-moraviske landegrensen i Jihlava i Tsjekkia.
answer_translated_eng: The Jihlava River partially forms the old Czech-Moravian land border in Jihlava, Czech Republic.
